info.name: ng.app.converter
info.summary: Convert text attributes to representative view and cache them
info.html_description:
[name:недописано]


* Sun Jul 12 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.8
- NameSpace "converter" added, this namespace intend to lookup utitility,
registered as IConverter by name;
- Some speed up was archived by optimisation of IPropertySheet adapter;
- ConverterKeyword added. The converter intended to obtain keywords from text by
means of some ruleset;
- Prototype of ConverterDictProxy added. Please, don't use it.

* Wed Feb 11 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.7
- Regexp converter has been enchanced in url quoting functions;

* Sat Jan 17 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.6
- The base class added to be base of other multiregexp converters;
- "Simple ReST" converter added;
- Many field added to allow customize ReST converter;
- Common test view for converters enchanced;

* Thu Feb 21 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.5
- Default value changed for sententce matching regexp of annotator;
- Default value set into class attribute "minimalrating" of annotator;

* Wed Feb 06 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.4
- Save data in cache occurs now only if changed
- Bug in annotator by means of converter changed any time fixed;

* Sat Feb 02 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.3
- The get method added into IPS interface
- Bug in max mtime evaluation code of cnverterchain fixed
- In annotator converter new default pattern added to match
- All adding forms are fixed

* Mon Jan 21 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.2
- Debuging statements removed
- Zope3.4 compatibility fixes

* Wed Jan 9 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.1
- Time modifcation callculation changed
- Some documentation added
- Some converters change name

* Thu Jan 3 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.0.0
- first official release
